system.summary: Repair a fully or partially broken item related to your specialization.

description.value: So long as it is something you could build with your specialization, you can repair a fully broken object or item at ½ the material cost in ½ the sessions using the @Compendium[undertaking.tables.WS5UX4KFBB0PAZAE]{Craft Artisanal} table. Partially damaged objects require fewer parts and less time to repair, ask your GM for the difficulty and cost of a partial repair. Intelligence (Craft) checks to repair parts have a DC of 12.
